duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify and optimize work patterns within Salaried Productivity across the organization.
Run process mappings and workshops with dedicated stakeholders.
Assess departments or organization to identify potentials for improvement.
Support leaders and employees in the implementation of new ways of working through the train the trainer approach.
Encourage a culture of sustainable change and productivity driven mindsets to achieve productivity goals.
Promote and improve results by leveraging lean tools, consulting skills, business acumen, and change management processes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Consulting, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
